name: 黃聲東
objective: 介紹單位換算與有效數位，元素的原子結構、化學方程式平衡與計算，反應熱，氣體與氣體定律，大氣層與環境污染，週期表，化學鍵，化合物的分子結構，熱力學，動力學，反應機構，平衡常數，氧化與還原，酸鹼反應，電化學，混合物的分離及現代科技材料，奠定良好化學基礎。
schedule:
Weeks	Dates	         Content
1	2.16; 2.17	Chapter 11 Electrochemistry
2	2.23; 2.24	Chapter 11 Electrochemistry
3	3.2; 3.3	         Chapter 12 Quantum Mechanics and Atomic  
                                      theory
4	3.9; 3.10	         Chapter 12 Quantum Mechanics and Atomic 
                                      theory
5	3.16; 3.17	Chapter 13 Bonding: General Concepts
6	3.23; 3.24	Chapter 13 Bonding General Concepts
7	3.30              Exam I (Chapter 11- 13)
         3.31	         Chapter 14 Covalent Bonding
8	4.6; 4.7	         Chapter 14 Covalent Bonding
9	4.13; 4.14	Chapter 15 Chemical Kinetics
10	4.20; 4.21	Chapter 15 Chemical Kinetics
11	4.27; 4.28	Chapter 16 Liquids and Solids
12	5.4; 5.5	         Chapter 16 Liquids and Solids
13	5.11              Exam II (Chapter 14-16)
         5.12              Chapter 17 Properties of solution
14	5.18; 5.19	Chapter 17 Properties of solution
15	5.25; 5.26	Chapter 18 The Representative Elements; 
                                       Group 1A through 4A
16	6.1; 6.2	         Chapter 19 The Representative Elements; 
                                       Group 5A through 8A
17	6.8; 6.9	         Chapter 20 Transition Metals and 
                                      Coordination Chemistry
18	6.15	         Exam III (Chapter 17-20)
scorePolicy:
Exam I (30%); Exam II (30%); Exam III (30%)
             Attendance (10 %)
materials: Zumdahl, Steven S., Chemical Principles; Sixth Edition, Houghton Mifflin Company
